message: Let's split fairly, I'll take a bit more
I understand you want a larger share, but this split is more equitable.  Let's settle this quickly.
I'm willing to compromise, but I still think I deserve a bit more
Alice, let's be reasonable. This is a fair split and we're losing money with each round. Time to agree!
I'll give in a bit, but I still think I can get a better deal
Alice, this is getting ridiculous.  A 50/50 split is the only fair option.  Don't let greed make us both losers!
